<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/emailactivation"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the email activation settings.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"show":{"description":"Specifies whether to show the email activation panel to the user or not","type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated email activation settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Show":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"EmailActivationSettings"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
